title: Super-Delicious Zuppa Toscana
description: If you love the Zuppa Toscana at your local chain Italian restaurant, you will adore this soup. The rich soup is made with Italian sausage, potatoes, cream, and crushed red pepper.

title: Baked Buffalo Cauliflower wings (Vegan Option)
description: Soft and tender on the inside and crispy on the outside these cauliflower buffalo "wings" are so close to the real deal it's hard to believe! This recipe is a great substitution for buffalo wings

title: Vegan Chickpea Tikka Masala with Green Rice
description: This Vegan Chickpea Tikka Masala recipe with Green Rice makes an easy weeknight meal. It's dairy-free and sugar-free, made with protein-rich chickpeas.

title: Roasted Cauliflower and Lentil Tacos
description: You're going to love this vegetarian lentil tacos recipe. Roasted cauliflower, seasoned lentils and creamy chipotle sauce combine to make a delicious taco!

title: Vegetarian Stuffed Acorn Squash Recipe
description: This vegetarian stuffed acorn squash recipe is beautiful and delicious! The cheesy quinoa filling develops an irresistible crispy top in the oven. So good!

title: Healthy Chicken Piccata in the Instant Pot
description: Healthy chicken piccata isn't breaded, but it still has all the flavor of the original. Plus, it's ready in less than 30 minutes using your pressure cooker!

title: Thai Panang Curry with Vegetables
description: This Thai panang curry recipe is SO easy to make at home and tastes better than take-out! This recipe is full of veggies and fresh flavor. Tofu is optional.

title: Easy Steak Fajitas
description: Easy Steak Fajitas - Tender, juicy, melt-in-your-mouth slices of steak with bell peppers and onion. SO SO GOOD. Serve with tortillas, pico and guacamole.

title: Peanut Slaw with Soba Noodles
description: A healthy Asian slaw made with cabbage, carrots and soba noodles (optional), tossed in a bold peanut-sesame sauce.

title: Thai Red Curry Recipe with Vegetables
description: This Thai red curry recipe is so easy to make at home! It's much tastier than takeout and healthier, too. This recipe is vegetarian, vegan and gluten free!

title: Perfect Grilled Cheese
description: Perfect Grilled Cheese from The Modern Proper

title: Avocado Sweet Potato Tacos Recipe
description: These simple chile-spiced Avocado Sweet Potato Tacos make a delicious vegetarian dinner topped with creamy avocado-yogurt lime sauce. Vegan option.

title: Spicy Black Bean Soup Recipe
description: This healthy black bean soup recipe is easy to make with canned beans. It's absolutely delicious and naturally vegan, vegetarian and gluten free!

title: Favorite Breakfast Tacos Recipe
description: These breakfast tacos are SO delicious! Plus, they're easy to make with leftover veggies. Make these egg tacos for breakfast, or a simple lunch or dinner!

title: Baked Ziti with Roasted Vegetables
description: This amazing baked ziti recipe is lightened up with roasted vegetables. Golden mozzarella, sizzling red sauce and pasta make this vegetarian ziti delicious!

title: Homemade Vegetarian Chili
description: This simple vegetarian chili recipe tastes incredible! It's easy to make with basic pantry ingredients, vegetables and spices. Gluten free and easily vegan.

title: Vegetarian Tortilla Soup
description: Healthy and quick tortilla soup recipe. This soup is gluten free and easily made vegan.

title: Best Vegetable Lasagna Recipe
description: Seriously the best veggie lasagna! This meatless lasagna recipe is packed with bell pepper, zucchini and carrots, sautéed until golden on the edges.

title: Vietnamese Fresh Spring Rolls Recipe
description: With fresh vegetables wrapped in rice paper, these Vietnamese spring rolls are a refreshing appetizer for an Asian-inspired meal.

title: Portobello Mushroom Burgers
description: The steak of veggie burgers. Serve on a bun with lettuce, tomato, and aioli sauce. Oh yeah!

title: Thai Drunken Noodles (Pad Kee Mao)
description: Make this popular Thai street food in your own home with everyday ingredients! Authentic, fast and easy - this is real Pad Kee Mao (Drunken Noodles).

title: Roasted Butternut Squash Kale Salad with Chickpeas and Cranberries
description: Roasted Butternut Squash Kale Salad topped with honey roasted cranberries and crispy seasoned chickpeas. This vegetarian side dish is healthy + delicious!

title: Healthy Granola Recipe
description: This delicious healthy granola recipe is the best! It's naturally sweetened with maple syrup (or honey). Just add oats, coconut oil, nuts and dried fruit.

title: Broccoli Quinoa Cakes!
description: These vegetarian Broccoli Quinoa Cakes can be made in 30 minutes flat & are a delicious healthy meal that your whole family will love! Instead, create a clearing in the dense forest of your life and wait there patiently, until the song that is your life falls into your own cupped hands and you recognize and greet it. title: Kimchi Fried Rice
description: Korean-Style, Kimchi Fried Rice, a 20 minute vegetarian dinner, packed full of flavor & veggies, topped with an Egg (or Crispy Tofu). Swap out Cauliflower Rice for a Low Carb option! Healthy, vegan-adaptable and delicious! And of course, you can make your own homemade kimchi - super easy!  Whatever arises, love that. ~Matt Kahn~ I 'd like you to meet my new best friend - Kimchi Fried Rice! Breakfast, lunch, dinner, or for a late-night snack - this flavor bomb hailing from Korea is sure to satisfy and can be made in under 20 minutes! A delicious healthy weeknight dinner in no

title: Stuffed Peppers Recipe
description: Learn how to make the BEST stuffed peppers! In this healthy, delicious, and easy recipe, a zesty rice and black bean mixture fills tender red bell peppers.

description: This a rich, yet light, mushroom pasta is quick enough for weeknight dinners but fancy enough for weekends! Vegan and gluten free options.

description: The BEST Butternut Squash Soup recipe -- quick and easy to make, lightened-up with healthier ingredients (no cream needed), and SO cozy and delicious!

description: Learn how to make homemade pizza with this easy recipe! Prep your homemade pizza dough, make your sauce, and then finish it all with your favorite toppings.

description: The creamiest Vegan Caramelized Onion Mashed Potatoes that are dairy-free & filled with swirls of french onions & fresh thyme!

description: This healthy lentil soup recipe comes together quickly with pantry ingredients. Simple spices, fresh greens and a squeeze of lemon make it the best! Vegan.

description: With its moist texture, banana and brown sugar flavors, and super soft crumb, this is the best ever banana bread recipe. You'll need 4 spotty bananas.
